summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Flexo Paper Factory production management system. All 4 modules (Yönetim, Operatör, Plan, Depo) tested successfully with full backend API coverage and frontend UI integration.

design_issues.issue: Missing Description or aria-describedby for accessibility

passed_tests: All 20 backend API endpoints (100% success rate)
Operatör flow: Name entry → Machine selection → Job management
Plan flow: Password authentication (12341) → Job creation form
Yönetim flow: Password authentication (432122) → Shift management → Analytics tabs
Depo flow: Warehouse requests → Manual pallet scanning
